descriptions.description: This table provides geometric properties (e.g., length and diameter) of selected vessels in the blood vasculature Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, plus Biomarkers (ASCT+B) table. The same vessel geometric property might be listed multiple times with different values. These correspond to different references that reported the property.

alternateIdentfier.alternateIdentfierType: How to Cite This Data Table

alternateIdentfiers.alternateIdentfier: Griffin Weber; Katherine S Gustilo. Blood Vasculature Geometry, v1.0, https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM796.WLLL.599, Accessed on June 15, 2023.

alternateIdentfier.alternateIdentfierType: How to Cite Vascular Geometry Tables Overall

alternateIdentfiers.alternateIdentfier: Boppana, Avinash, Sujin Lee, Rajeev Malhotra, Marc Halushka, Ellen M Quardokus, Bruce W. Herr, Katy Börner, and Griffin M Weber. “Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, and Biomarkers of the Healthy Human Blood Vasculature.” BioRxiv, January 1, 2022, 2022.02.28.482302. https://doi.org/10.1101/2022.02.28.482302.
